properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
ARGENTINA.
DNC 07.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
   BY M/V BGP PROSPECTOR TOWING 12 7000 METER LONG
   CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   52-54.57S 067-56.75W, 52-53.65S 067-26.68W,
   52-59.48S 067-20.51W, 52-53.89S 067-05.72W,
   52-56.91S 066-50.36W, 53-14.47S 066-32.16W,
   53-14.38S 065-39.25W, 54-11.52S 065-38.73W,
   54-11.79S 066-22.63W, 54-03.79S 066-35.55W,
   53-55.67S 066-59.25W, 53-01.83S 067-53.97W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 386/24.
